overview:
Charkrid is an avid entrepreneur who is passionate about social media, web, and mobile technology. He found a few tech start-ups. And dream of building Silicon Valley in his country to bring opportunity to people, and promote the society of wisdom.

Currently, he is managing two companies; Figabyte, a social media agency that helps brands make new friends and create conversation through social applications. He is also a founder at ISLT, which invented Broadcaster, an advanced AR broadcasting studio that can produce 3D live broadcasting programs, similar quality to CNN, but without using expensive equipment.

He was a co-founder of Azenqos, a mobile network tester solution on smartphones, which was acquired in 2008. Prior to Azenqos, Charkrid founded a nutritional sport supplement company called BodyTech, while he was studying civil engineering at Kasetsart University.

In his university days, he was heavily involved in web developer communities, seminars, and competitions. He won the web award from the Thai Webmaster Association in 2004. After that, he gave consult and designed large-scale websites, web applications, to big companies in Thailand. In the meantime that he was running a business, Charkrid took a Masterâ€™s degree in International Marketing program where he participated a lot in new ventures, business plan competitions.

Charkrid is a hobby graphic designer, programmer, buddhist practitioner, and dog father. He love Bossa Nova music, playing guitar, and laying on the beach. Three words about him; Creative, Learning, Kind.
